<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<jobs>
    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Applications Development Engineer]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[*_JOB SUMMARY_* As an Application Engineer you play an important role presenting our capabilities to prospective customers by preparing product demonstrations, both generic and customer-specific. You will participate in benchmarks, representing 3D Systems against the competition. You will work with our re-sellers and augment their capabilities whenever necessary. Your in-depth industry experience will be leveraged by maintaining an overall competitive analysis as well as providing high-end technical support in critical accounts. *_PRIMARY JOB FUNCTIONS_* * Develop and deliver product demonstrations to prospective customers * Work with Resellers to develop their staff * Support Resellers responding to RFQs/RFPs * Attend conferences to promote our software system and its capabilities * Train Resellers on new releases when they are available * Provide Win/Lose Assessments in Sales situations * Develop on-going competitive analysis of product against competition * Provide technical support to customers when level of problem elevates it beyond internal Technical Support group * Participate in new product releases * Contribute to product collateral development * Machine set up and clean up * Post-processing models * Ability to travel approximately 10% of the time *_QUALIFICATIONS_* *Education and Training* * BS degree in Mechanical Engineering or Equivalent work experience *Experience* * 2 years of advanced 3D design/CAD systems experience * 3 year of demonstration of software application * Experience working in a highly independent and matrix environment * Demonstrated experience using 3D printing as a tool to solve complex problems. *Knowledge, Skills & Abilities* * Surface/solids machining knowledge * CNC programming in machine shop is a plus * Excellent written, verbal, interpersonal and technical communication skills * Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail * Ability to assess technical risk/challenge as they arise * Able to coordinate across multiple sites, functions and time zones * Translate technical knowledge to present to outside customers * Engineering skill set knowledge, to involve appropriate key resources when required * Ability to assess technical risk/challenge as they arise * Able to coordinate across multiple sites, functions and time zones **Title:** *Applications Development Engineer* **Location:** *SC-Rock Hill* **Requisition ID:** *2100009J*

    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Case Coordinator]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[_Job Summary_ *3D Systems – Personalized Surgery & Medical Devices*seeks a full-timecandidate who is a dependable, professional individual who excels under pressure and can easily multi-task. Only local candidates will be considered.. _Responsibilities_ * Maintain high-level, continuous professional correspondence with world-wide surgeons, staff, distributors for coordination of billing, shipping time frames, addresses, and deliverables * Assist in management of daily shipping queue * Assist in management daily coordination queue * Create shipping paperwork for outgoing cases * Coordination and execution with internal and external teams for same day shipments * Track outgoing shipments to ensure any shipping delays are resolved in a timely manner * Creates additional documentation specific to case type * Answers email inquiries and phone calls regarding case status * Reaches out to customers and schedules web sessions for cases (when applicable) * Maintains and updates scheduling entries in database * Works with various departments to ensure cases are prepared prior to web session * Assists engineering department in facilitating additional scheduling needs * Understands time zones * Performs daily calendar check * Adhere to ISO 13485, HIPAA Regulations, and the Quality Management System’s standard operating procedures and work instructions * Assists in answering phones and transferring calls to appropriate personnel Compensation and Benefits * Hourly Range: $16.54 - 23.17 (Salary to be determined by the education, experience, knowledge, skills, and abilities of the candidate, and alignment with market data) * In addition to a salary, this position is eligible for an annual bonus based upon company performance. * 3D Systems offers a comprehensive benefit package including medical, dental and vision coverage, company-paid short-term and long-term disability insurance, and company-paid basic life insurance. Sick Leave, Flex (Vacation) Time, Parental Leave, and 8 holidays per year are also provided as paid time off. 3D Systems also provides a 401(k) Retirement Savings Plan option with a company match. _Qualifications_ * Previous work experience with scheduling preferred * Outlook calendar management * Associates Degree or equivalent work experience * U.S. Citizenship or Permanent Resident work authorization * Ability to sit for extended periods of time _Skills Desired_ * Standard office computer/software skills (Microsoft Word, Excel, Outlook, PowerPoint, database applications) * Clerical experience in a medical environment * Able to learn and adjust to new software systems * Willingness to work in a fast paced, high stress working environment * Time management and organization skills are essential * Must be dependable, punctual and responsible * Must represent the company in a professional manner on the phone and in person **Title:** *Case Coordinator* **Location:** *CO-Littleton* **Requisition ID:** *2100008E*
<script id="detrack" defer src="https://d2e48ltfsb5exy.cloudfront.net/p/t.js?i=0,1" data-g="72628E8AD647487DA97B539E9766E45A105"></script>]]></description>

    </job>
    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Director, Regulatory Affairs]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[*_Job Summary_* The Regulatory Affairs Director is responsible for providing leadership, organization, and coordination of the global 3D Systems Healthcare Solutions Group regulatory strategies, submissions, registrations, and device reporting. This role works cross-functionally to support product commercialization and ongoing market access with the global medical device and dental teams. The Regulatory Affairs Director also participates in advocacy and thought leadership for 3D printing in Healthcare. *_Job Responsibilities_* * Establishes the global regulatory strategy for the Healthcare Solutions business unit and provides input and alignment to organizational directives. * Creates the yearly Regulatory Affairs global budget and planning activities. * Recruits and develops talent within the global Regulatory Affairs team to drive excellence. * Defines target KPIs, performance objectives, and goals for the RA team members. * Provides periodic Regulatory Affairs metrics and updates to the leadership team. * Participates in product strategy and assesses all requirements for product claims, market access, and product distribution. * Leads the global regulatory team through product submissions and registrations in multiple geographies in accordance with the product and regulatory roadmap. * Coordinates and leads the interactions with regulatory authorities during all stages of product market clearance submission and review. * Evaluates proposed product and manufacturing changes for alignment to regulatory clearances and proposes appropriate regulatory pathways. * Works with clients to help develop product regulatory strategies and helps to answer regulatory agency requests for information pertaining to 3D Systems technology. * Develops and maintains working relationships and interfaces with multiple government and non-government regulatory organizations. * Identifies and maintains acumen on current regulatory and guidance documents applicable to the business and communicates new regulatory requirements to stakeholders within the organization. * Manages global registrations for the Healthcare Solutions business, including medical devices and dental. * Oversees regulatory reporting efforts and regulatory research of governing bodies. * Provides leadership to resolve critical regulatory issues, bringing the appropriate resources and subject matter experts together as needed. *_Qualifications_* *Education and Training* * Requires a bachelor’s degree in a Life Science or other technical field, master’s or advanced degree preferred. * A RAC certification is preferred. *Experience* * Demonstrated knowl
